inclusion.criterion: Evidence of a personally signed and dated informed consent document indicating that the subject has been informed of all pertinent aspects of the study;
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Subject is willing and able to comply with scheduled visits, treatment plan, laboratory tests, and other study procedures;
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Histologically diagnosed endometrioid or high-grade serous ovarian cancer, estrogen (ER) and/or progesterone (PR) receptor positive (defined as > 10% by immunohistochemistry);
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patients must have completed 2 previous courses of chemotherapy: The penultimate regimen must be a platinum-based chemotherapy course prior to enrolment on the study;
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: Formalin fixed, paraffin embedded tumor sample from the primary tumor must be available for central testing;
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group (ECOG) performance status ≤ 2;
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Adequate bone marrow function at screening: Absolute Neutrophil Count (ANC) ≥ 1,500/mm³ (≥ 1.5x10^9/L);
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Adequate liver function at screening: Total serum bilirubin ≤ 1.5 x upper limit of normal (ULN);
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Adequate renal function at screening: Serum creatinine ≤ 1.5 x ULN or estimated creatinine clearance ≥ 50mL/min;
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Evidence of non-childbearing potential: Postmenopausal (defined as at least 1 year without any menses) prior to screening,
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Patients with a known hypersensitivity to Palbociclib or Letrozole or any of the excipients of the product;
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Previous treatment with CDK inhibitors or endocrine therapy;
exclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Patients receiving any chemotherapy, radiotherapy, within 3 weeks from the last dose prior to study entry;
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient is a 42 year-old postmenopausal woman who had a screening sonogram which revealed an abnormality in the right breast. She had no palpable masses on breast exam.
